committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Mining and Natural Resources

official_title: To establish an Abandoned Minerals and Materials Mine Reclamation Fund to provide for the reclamation of areas adversely affected by certain mining activities, and for other purposes.
short_title: Abandoned Minerals and Materials Mine Reclamation Fund Act of 1989

summary.text: Abandoned Minerals and Materials Mine Reclamation Fund Act of 1989 - Establishes the Abandoned Minerals and Materials Mine Reclamation Fund for the reclamation of land and water resources adversely affected by past mining. Sets forth a priorities schedule for expenditures from the Fund. Prescribes guidelines for Fund allocations and expenditures. Authorizes appropriations. Terminates the Fund ten years after enactment of this Act.

titles.title: Abandoned Minerals and Materials Mine Reclamation Fund Act of 1989
To establish an Abandoned Minerals and Materials Mine Reclamation Fund to provide for the reclamation of areas adversely affected by certain mining activities, and for other purposes.
